Name: SpaceSeals
About the game: SpaceSeals is an exciting third-person shooter set in a spaceship captured by hostile robots. You are a brave space marine who has to get out of the ship, overcoming crowds of hostile and dangerous robotic invaders. Shoot the robots, using different cartridges wisely, but do not forget that robots explode after death, creating additional difficulties. Realistic 3D graphics and well-chosen sounds and music immerse you in action, creating an atmosphere of space adventure. Break free from captivity and save yourself and your crew by leaving the ship.
